quote: There is no way to happiness, happiness is the way
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Why are you surprise that traveling does you no good, when you travel in your own company? The thing that weighs on your mind is the same as what drove you from home
author: Socrate

quote: No matter where you go, there you are
author: Some stranger on Reddit

quote: There are always a million reasons not to do something
author: Jan, The Office

quote: In a world full of calculated games, the best one to play is the one that requires no scoreboard in the first place.
author: Lawrence Yeo

quote: Improvise and enjoy the chaos
author: Marco Bellomo, a guy met at the pub

quote: When you fire some love at someone there is a recoil
author: Some stranger on Reddit

quote: The costs of your good habits are in the present. The costs of your bad habits are in the future.
author: James Clear

quote: Any organization that designs a system (defined broadly) will produce a design whose structure is a copy of the organization's communication structure.
author: Melvin E. Conway

quote: As engineers, create a world that is beautiful to live in
author: Tommaselli, high-school professor

quote: We often suffer more in imagination than in reality
author: Seneca

quote: Be the change you want to see in the world
author: Gandhi

quote: You are depressed if you live in the past. You are anxious if you live in the future. You are at peace if you live in the present.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be the person you would like to meet.
author: HappyLuca, Reddit

quote: Comparison is the thief of joy
author: Unknown

quote: Your reality today is temporary. No matter how beautiful or ugly it is, know that it will change. Be ready.
author: giuliodxb, Reddit

quote: Life is chaos; pretending things like this are in your control is useless. Punishing yourself for not knowing what you didn't know in the past is cruel.
author: adam12, HN

quote: To lead is to go before and show the way
author: buildo

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss it you will land among the stars. (Always chase your dreams, even if you don't get them, you sure as hell will get something close to it)
author: Les Brown

quote: The part of life we really live is small. All the rest is not life, but merely time.
author: Seneca

quote: People meet to be reborn. Being born is never enough for anyone.
author: Franco Arminio

quote: I would like to wander the sky like swallows and every now and then stop here and there.
author: Lucio Dalla

quote: You have to keep a dozen of your favorite problems constantly present in your mind, although by and large they will lay in a dormant state. Every time you hear or read a new trick or result, test it against each of your twelve problems to see whether it helps. Every once in a while there will be a hit, and people will say, 'How did he do it? He must be a genius!
author: Richard Feynman

quote: You will get rich by giving society what it wants but does not yet know how to get. At scale.
author: Naval

quote: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so
author: Shakespeare

quote: It's not things that upsets us but our judgments about things
author: Epictetus

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living
author: Socrates

quote: Distance yourself from people that you don't want to become
author: Shane Parrish

quote: Your home is not where you were born. Home is where all your attempts to escape cease.
author: Nagib Mahifuz

quote: You are a function of the people you spend the most time with, your habits, and your environment.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: The purpose of knowledge is action, not knowledge.
author: Aristotle

quote: Knowledge isn't free. You have to pay attention
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Information is not truth
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: If I were the plaything of every thought, I would be a fool, not a wise man.
author: Rumi

quote: The wise man knows the Self, and he plays the game of life. But the fool lives in the world like a beast of burden.
author: Ashtavakra Gita (4â€•1)

quote: Saying yes frequently is an additive strategy. Saying no is a subtractive strategy. Keep saying no to a lot of things - the negative and unimportant ones - and once in awhile, you will be left with an idea which is so compelling that it would be a screaming no-brainer 'yes'.
author: Unknown

quote: We overestimate our short-term ability, but underestimate our long-term ability.
author: This guy

quote: If you don't have a plan, you can't fail
author: Alex Andriulo

quote: Don't confuse habit with happiness
author: Someone on Radio2

quote: When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure
author: Goodhart's law

quote: Given two options, the greatest cost opportunity is being undecided
author: Me

quote: A life well lived is a series of personal obsessions shared without expectation of an audience.
author: HN Comment

quote: It's easy to be busy. It's hard to be productive.
author: Farnam Street

quote: Clear writing gives poor thinking nowhere to hide.
author: Farnam Street

quote: A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Talent and potential mean nothing if you can't consistently do the boring things when you don't feel like doing them.
author: Farnam Street

quote: Write your obituary and try to figure out how to live up to it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Simple can be harder than complex. You have to work hard to get your thinking clean, to make it simple. But it's worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Consistently boring days make for extraordinary decades.
author: Farnam Street

quote: People don't buy what you do, they buy why you do it
author: Simon Sinek

quote: It isn't what you have, or who you are, or where you are, or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Keep the goal. Change your mind about how to reach it. One sign you're getting in your own way, is not changing your tactics when you're not getting the result you want.
author: Farnam Street

quote: You are under no obligation to remain the same person you were a year ago, a month ago, or even a day ago. You are here to create yourself, continuously.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: It's useful to look at the long term, but look closely at what you like to do in the short term at 10 PM in the evening
author: Jaga Santagostino

quote: Intelligence is whatever machines haven't done yet
author: Larry Tesler

quote: If we only do what we're familiar with, we might miss what we've been made for.
author: Bob Goff

quote: There's a reason why dough must rest before it can rise.
author: I.D.E.A. Newsletter

quote: It is remarkable how much long-term advantage people like us have gotten by trying to be consistently not stupid, instead of trying to be very intelligent.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: You find out by doing, not thinking.
author: AJ

quote: No one is going to live my life for me, and every second I spend sitting around feeling distant from my true desires, avoiding the world and being afraid to engage it, is a second that I'm forfeiting the biggest gift of all: my time here in this life. [..] because that is what life does: it rewards you. It's giving you gifts every day. Are you going to accept them?
author: Mark Manson

quote: Your ability to deal with the failure will determine how much you get to deal with success.
author: Dan Kennedy

quote: Stress doesn't come from hard work. Stress comes from not taking action.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Life doesn't shrink us our refusal to face life is what shrinks us
author: RaQuel Hopkins

quote: Wisdom does not come from experiences. It does come from reflecting on those experiences and change your actions in consequence
author: Adam Grant

quote: Courage is doing it scared
author: Unknown
